basics.name: Kevin Sidarous
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software generalist with a backend focus. I strive to write code that is simple and performs well. Solving problems with the proper tools and learning new things are what I enjoy most in my work.

education.summary: Major in Big Data and Large-Scale Computing

skills.name: Programming languages
skills.description: Worked with a variety of languages along the years including C/C++, Python, Rust, Clojure/ClojureScript, Kotlin, Scala, TypeScript, Bash and more.

skills.name: Technologies
skills.description: Worked across the stack with things like: React, Angular, Flutter, Node.js, SQL (PostegreSQL), Docker, AWS, GCP
